jobs.title: Back-end Developer (Golang)
jobs.description:
Have the chance to work with talented developers, following high-standard software development practices.
 Be trained and worked on complex systems using cutting-edge technology-based frameworks.
responsibilities: Support the development team to develop the application using ReactJS.
Other tasks assigned by the leader.

general: 4th year/new graduate students majoring in Computer Science/Software Engineering/related fields.
skills: Know ReactJS, or Redux, Redux-Saga, Webpack, Babel or VueJS, VueX (including university/part-time projects).

At least 2 trips a year: Team Building, Company Trip, and other big events.

Floor 3 - 5, Waseco Building, No. 10 Pho Quang, Ward 02, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City

jobs.title: Bridge Engineer (BrSE/PM/Japanese)
jobs.description: Work as a bridge between Vietnamese and Japanese development teams, managing projects and ensuring smooth communication between both sides.
responsibilities: Translate technical documents and communicate requirements between Japanese clients and Vietnamese engineers.
Manage project progress, quality, and delivery.
Support PMs and clients in defining requirements and system specifications.

general: Bachelor’s degree in IT or related fields.
Japanese language proficiency (JLPT N2 or higher).
Experience as BrSE or PM in software development projects.
skills: Excellent communication and project management skills.
Understanding of both Japanese business culture and software engineering processes.

compensation: Health and social insurance according to company policy.
spiritual: Team-building trips, Japanese company-style working culture.
Opportunities to work directly with clients in Japan.

workingTime: Working from Monday - Friday and the last Saturday of the month, working hours 8:30 - 17:30 (8 hours/day), public holidays according to state regulations.
Floors 3 - 5, Waseco Building, No. 10 Pho Quang, Ward 02, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City.
